snippet: SCHECHTER--Loren. Our dear friend of more than four decades. We love you and we will always miss you. Our thoughts are with your family. Tom and Loretta Skip and Beth Jim and Connie Kevin and Nancy 1/3
lead_paragraph: SCHECHTER--Loren. Our dear friend of more than four decades. We love you and we will always miss you. Our thoughts are with your family. Tom and Loretta Skip and Beth Jim and Connie Kevin and Nancy 1/3
